titles.title: Shikoyaka Naru Toki mo Hameru Toki mo
シコやかなるときもハメるときも

data.title: Shikoyaka Naru Toki mo Hameru Toki mo
data.title_japanese: シコやかなるときもハメるときも
data.synopsis:
This anime is divided into four chapters.

Part 1
Frigid, dark, lonely.... a man lost in the cold suddenly comes upon the cure for his ailments... a hotspring! Turns out there are some fantastic attendants there as well!

Part 2
She worked her way up in the world with absolutely zero sexual or romantic experience. All it takes is a little alcohol to grease the gears and she can't contain herself! This is what years of holding back has resulted in!

Part 3
A very popular orchestral happens to have a lewd switch, and when that switch is turned on there is no turning off until she's satisfied!

Part 4
A tutor for a wealthy boy ends up turning him into an A student, however he has a proposition for her for some "extracurricular activities" so that she can continue her tutoring...

(Source: hanime)

entry.name: Shikoyaka Naru Toki mo Hameru Toki mo
